headline.main: SLOW-DOWN HINTED IN REICH INDUSTRIES; Wage Cuts for Production Slump Suggest Official Retaliation

lead_paragraph: STOCKHOLM, Oct. 1 -- Has the "go-slow" movement inaugurated in occupied countries already reached the German factories?
abstract: Stockholm sources rept wage cuts for output slump; speculation on spread of go-slow movement to Germany
snippet: STOCKHOLM, Oct. 1 -- Has the "go-slow" movement inaugurated in occupied countries already reached the German factories?...

byline.original: By Telephone to THE NEW YORK TIMES
